newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Ara started as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Ara started as hold.

text.p: Grupo Financiero Serfin on Thursday initiated coverage of Mexican construction firm Consorcio Ara SA de CV with a hold recommendation.
-- Analyst Gerardo Saenz wrote in a report that ARA, with a potential price of 31.70 pesos by the end of the year, "offers a yield similar to that of the market, so we are recommending hold."
-- Ara stands to benefit from a general housing shortage in Mexico and prospects for economic growth, according to Saenz.
-- Cash-flow for 1997 and 1998 looks good because of the company's low level of debt, he said.
-- Serfin estimated EPS of 1.65 pesos in 1997 and 2.47 pesos in 1998.
-- Ara was trading up 40 centavos to 28 pesos in early afternoon trade on Thursday.
